mapper.update:
update EMPI_USER
f_username = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_icn = #{icn, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_sex = #{sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_birthday = #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_nation = #{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update EMPI_USER
f_username = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empi_id = #{newEmpiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_icn = #{icn, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_sex = #{sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_birthday = #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_nation = #{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_tel = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_photo = #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_regaddress = #{regaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_preaddress = #{preaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_updatedate= #{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_updator= #{updator, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where del_flag = 1 and f_state = 1 and empi_id = #{empiId}
mapper.select:
select u.f_user_id, u.empi_id, u.f_username, u.f_icn, u.f_sex, u.f_birthday, u.f_nation, u.f_tel, u.f_photo, u.f_regaddress, u.f_preaddress, u.f_state, u.f_createdate, u.f_updatedate, u.f_creator, u.f_updator, u.del_flag, c.card_id, c.card_no, c.card_sid, c.card_type, c.card_state, c.empi_id cempi from EMPI_USER u left outer join EMPI_CARD c on u.empi_id = c.empi_id and c.card_state = 1
u.del_flag = 1 and u.f_state = 1 AND u.empi_id = #{empi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select u.f_user_id, u.empi_id, u.f_username, u.f_icn, u.f_sex, u.f_birthday, u.f_nation, u.f_tel, u.f_photo, u.f_regaddress, u.f_preaddress, u.f_state, u.f_createdate, u.f_updatedate, u.f_creator, u.f_updator, u.del_flag, c.card_id, c.card_no, c.card_sid, c.card_type, c.card_state, c.empi_id cempi from EMPI_USER u left outer join EMPI_CARD c on u.empi_id = c.empi_id and c.card_state = 1 where u.del_flag = 1 and u.f_state = 1 AND u.empi_id in (select c.empi_id from EMPI_CARD c where c.card_state = 1 and c.card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
